data.title: Discgolf (Frisbee) park which is shared space with walking and biking trails
data.text: If you play Discgolf (Frisbee) this is probably an excellent place.  Saw many people playing there over the last couple days, and it looks like it could take a few hours to play a round.  The course is next to the Purple Trail so if you are walking along the trail you can see people playing.  Its along a creek so there will be a lot of water hazards.  The markings for where to throw and where the 'holes' are seem clear.
